name: Dark Legacy
description:
Dark Legacy is the story of a shadow cuboid named Dark Boxy who must collect the 30 Jade Coins to prevent his world from dying. However, there are those who would dare stand in his way, known as the Sidewinders, unkillable creatures created from the apocalypse attempting to consume every he holds dear. (This game is a project that I'm working on for a college class.) 

Link To User Testing Survey: https://forms.gle/Bj6bcQS5xve4ykzj8
